question: Why do we use React?
answer: React is an open-source front-end JavaScript library. It is used for building user interfaces for web and mobile apps., especially for single-page applications. Advantages of React: i.Increases the application 's performance with Virtual DOM. ii.JSX makes code easy to read and write. iii.It renders both on client and server side(SSR). iv.Easy to integrate with frameworks(Angular, Backbone) since it is only a view library. v.Easy to write unit and integration tests with tools such as Jest.
